markdownRemark.excerpt:
I live more on Twitter these days. I am a man of few words so having a blog is hard for me sometimes.
I try to write at least one tweet per day and if I ever…
markdownRemark.html: I live more on Twitter these days. I am a man of few words so having a blog is hard for me sometimes. I try to write at least one tweet per day and if I ever need more space I’ll tweet a link to my blog.

frontmatter.title: I Am Getting Better at Drawing
